Html:
hey,guys:
I have two questions when i play a mp4 file use the sdk.
First question,how can i hide the quick time player User interface?
Second question,why it doesn't work i set the property of AutoPlay false in QuickTimeMovie class?
thx.

lol,
i found the answer of first question,there is a property named MovieControllerVisible in AxQTControl.cs.
